post.author: mannerh
post.content:
만일 아래와 같은 일을 할 수 있는 분은 저한테 연락바랍니다. (ritchie.hwang@yahoo.com)

 

We are currently looking for J2EE Developers for long term contracts in Winnipeg, Manitoba for a large well known company. Contract is long term will go to March 2013. Hourly rate is $77. 

 

Requirement:   

  • Minimum of 5 - 10 years Development experience  
  • Minimum of 2 years using Java/J2EE for at least 2 unique AD or AM projects which utilized JSF/MyFaces and/or Struts, Spring, and Hibernate.
  • Experience using Java AD tools (which are Eclipse-based
  • Rational Software Architect, CodeGear JBuilder, MyEclipse;
  • Spring, Hibernate, and JSF/MyFaces and/or Struts) with Oracle databases (version 9i or higher) for: the design, development, unit & integration testing, and implementation of enterprise-grade Java/J2EE applications, web UI frameworks, sub-systems, and interfaces
  • Responsibility for the development of functional and system design specifications, performing manual code and UI changes, and manuals/documentation
  • Demonstrated leadership on an AD/AM Team for an end-to-end Java J2EE development project through the Rational Unified Process (RUP) project lifecycle from Inception through to Transition, including authoring RUP artefacts including including Elaboration and Construction Plans, Architecture Specifications, and Use Cases.
post.title: J2EE position
